definitions.text: a sail set next above the topgallant on a royal mast
stag with antlers of 12 or more branches
of or relating to or indicative of or issued or performed by a king or queen or other monarch
established or chartered or authorized by royalty
being of the rank of a monarch
belonging to or befitting a supreme ruler
examples: the royal carriage of a stag's head

definitions.text: invested with royal power as symbolized by a crown
examples: the royal (or crowned) heads of Europe
